title: Easily 3 Star the Hog Mountain Challenge (Clash of Clans)
author: Judo Sloth Gaming
description:
How to Complete the Hog Mountain Challenge in Clash of Clans. Judo Sloth Gaming provides a Tutorial Guide on How to Best 3 Star the Hog Mountain Challenge. This is an easy to follow method that will bring you 3 Stars and the Rewards for CoC when copied. Clash On!

Join 'The Dojo' to gain Exclusive Perks by becoming a Member of the Judo Sloth Gaming YT Channel: https://bit.ly/DojoMember

Thank you for using Code 'Judo' in Clash of Clans to support me: https://bit.ly/CodeJudo
